results.title: Rembrandt: draughtsman
results.creator_credit: Kees van Langeraad, Hans Nieman, Tina De Vrij, Nederlandse Omroep Stichting and Rijksmuseum Amsterdam
results.brief_description: The paintings of Dutch 17th century painter Rembrandt van Rijn, are world famous, but a large number of his beautiful drawings have never been seen by the public. This film explores this rich oeuvre, setting it in the context of Rembrandt’s life, his work, his contemporaries and the society of 17th century Holland.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Kees van Langeraad, Hans Nieman, Tina De Vrij, Nederlandse Omroep Stichting and Rijksmuseum Amsterdam

results.title: Relax it's just sex [DVD]
results.creator_credit: P.J. Castellaneta, Harold Warren, Megan O'Neill, Steven J Wolfe, Forefront Films, Millivres Multimedia and Sneak Preview Entertainment
results.brief_description: Relax its just sex is about a group of twenty/thirty-something friends - a mix of straight, lesbian, bi-sexual and homosexual - sorting through the complexities of their relationships with various lovers and friends. Tara (Jennifer Tilly) is the mother hen of the group who keeps them all together; Vincey is the only single one and longs for a partner; Sarina and Megan break up when Megan sleeps with a man; Robin is their friend who helps Sarina out. On the whole the film has a comic tone - the opening sequence cautions the audience that when it comes to homosexuality there is nothing to be afraid of. Nevertheless, the film soon turns tragic as it delves into issues such as AIDS and gay bashing. Characters frequently address the camera, explaining their inner thoughts and feelings about their current situation as well as musing on the nature of love and sex. With at least ten principal characters, some are not given enough screen time to develop beyond caricature and at times the film is stagnated by its talkiness. Despite these flaws however, “Relax its just sex” is by turns amusing, thought provoking and quite sexy.

results.title: Relationships and stress
results.creator_credit: David A. Tapper, Tapper Productions and Time-Life Video & Television
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Coping with Serious Illness”.
One part of a series of six programs which looks at the major problems faced by Joan Robinson, who is dying of cancer. This episode shows ways of handling the changing relationships with family, friends and medical personnel. Experts talk to the viewer about how serious illness can materially change relationships and how people can cope with the emotions and strains that inevitably follow diagnosis of a serious illness. Narrated by Meryl Streep.

results.title: Doctors and patients
results.creator_credit: David A. Tapper and Time-Life Video
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Coping with Serious Illness”.
This film is one of a series of six programs that address the major problems people face in coping with serious illness. The series is hosted by actress, Meryl Streep. This particular program examines the unique relationship that develops between a doctor and a dying patient and looks at the case of Joan Robinson, a woman dying of cancer. Cast also includes Meryl Streep.

Cast also includes Meryl Streep.

results.title: Pain (TEFC)
results.creator_credit: David A. Tapper and Time-Life Films
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Coping with Serious Illness”.
Meryl Streep hosts this film discussing with experts in the field of managing pain. Joan Robinson suffers from cancer. She has lived with unremitting chronic pain for months and years along with her husband Eric which clouded their work and personal lives. Joan and her doctors explored many kinds of medication with mixed results - sometimes they would work, others not so.

results.title: Reilly: ace of spies: an affair with a married woman
results.creator_credit: Jim Goddard, Chris Burt and Euston Films
results.brief_description: Sidney Reilly, said to have been the inspiration for James Bond, was probably the greatest spy the world has ever known. A rogue, womaniser, and brilliant tactician, he thrived on danger, performing extraordinary feats that changed the course of history. Reilly’s first mission involves undertaking a dangerous journey to Baku to investigate the Russian search for oil in the Middle East. Stars Sam Neill and Leo McKern.
results.title_for_label: Reilly: ace of spies: an affair with a married woman

results.title: Red firecracker, green firecracker [DVD] = Pao da shuang deng
results.creator_credit: He Ping, Chan Chun-Keung, Yung Naiming and Yung and Associates
results.brief_description: Cai Chunzhi’s (Jing Ning) family own a prosperous firecracker factory on the banks of the Yellow River in Northern China. When her father dies, because she is the only child she inherits the factory and becomes “Master”. She dresses like a man and everyone addresses her as “Master” but as a woman, her hold on power is tenuous and she carefully respects the authority of the factory head, Man Dihong. When she hires an artist to paint door gods for the Chinese New Year her life is turned upside down. Niu Bao is a handsome young painter whose pride and headstrong nature put him on a collision course with Dihong, as Bao and his ‘master’ struggle with their attraction to each other. Winner of 3 Golden Rooster Awards (the Chinese equivalent of the Oscars). Based on the novel by Feng Jicai.
results.title_for_label: Red firecracker, green firecracker [DVD] = Pao da shuang deng

results.title: Rehearsal
results.creator_credit: Roger Blais and National Film Board of Canada
results.brief_description: Much of the work of an orchestra and its conductor is done in shirt sleeves, in an empty hall. In this film we go behind the scenes with conductor Paul Scherman as he prepares a Montreal orchestra for a performance of a new composition by Canadian composer Harry Somers. Mr. Somers himself is on hand to hear this rehearsal of his Suite for Harp and Chamber Orchestra.
